critique: The document is a formal executive order regarding appointments within the Wage and Hour Division of the Department of Labor. It outlines the process for initial appointments to various positions, specifying that they can be made without adhering to the usual competitive requirements of the Civil Service Rules, provided certain qualifications are met. The language is formal and legalistic, typical of official government documents.The primary purpose of the document is to communicate a decision regarding personnel appointments and procedures. There is no explicit or implicit attempt to convey any particular emotion. Therefore, all emotions should be scored low.
